last_episode_to_air.name: Identity Crisis
last_episode_to_air.overview: This episode of Yahtzee’s Dev Diary, Space Game gets… half a title.

name: Yahtzee's Dev Diary
overview: Yahtzee’s Dev Diary is a brand new limited series from the creator of Zero Punctuation! Every month for a whole year, Yahtzee will create a video game and document his progress in a new video twice a month on Tuesdays.

seasons.name: 12 Games in 12 Months
seasons.overview: Every month for a whole year, Yahtzee will create a video game and document his progress.
